summary: Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers.
cast: Robin Williams|Cheryl Hines|JoJo|Josh Hutcherson|Jeff Daniels|Kristin Chenoweth|Hunter Parrish|Chloe Sonnenfeld|Alex Ferris|Will Arnett|Tony Hale|Brian Howe|Richard Ian Cox|Erika-Shaye Gair|Veronika Sztopa|Rob LaBelle|Brian Markinson|Kirsten Alter|Brendan Fletcher|Matthew Gray Gubler|Stephen E. Miller|Malcolm Scott|Deborah DeMille|Chad Krowchuk|Ty Olsson|Bruce McFee|Rebecca Erwin Spencer|Giacomo Baessato|Justin Chartier|Andrew Botz|Barry Sonnenfeld|Paul Anthony|Diane Michelle|Catherine Rose Young
title: ¡Vaya vacaciones!
